page.syntax: Text as C = ScanToAlphaNum as C()

argument.name: Text
argument.description: The text between the starting and ending offset positions.

page.description: Skip until a alphanumeric character is encountered. Return text we scanned over.
page.discussion: The <StringScanner>.ScanToAlphaNum() function moves the offset to the first alphabetic or numeric character.
page.example: dim scanner as P dim txt as C txt = <<%text% <..> is wonderful prose written by a technical writer of note. %text% ? txt = <..> is wonderful prose written by a technical writer of note. scanner = stringscanner.create(txt) ? scanner.scantoalphanum() = "<..> " ? scanner.GetToOffset() = "<..> " ? scanner.getremainder() = is wonderful prose written by a technical writer of note.
